messages: Wanna grab a slice? This bagel shop line is 40 ppl deep but worth it
just walked past the big Christmas tree and I'm feeling v festive
Do u think if I make it here I can make it anywhere or is that just a song?
I swear I just saw someone famous at Whole Foods but idk who lol
Traffic on the 405 is making me regret every life choice rn
Wanna hike to the Hollywood sign tmrw? The views r worth the pain
Deep dish or thin crust 2nite? This is literally life or death
The wind just blew me sideways and my hat is gone 4ever
omg I can see like 4 states from the top of this skyscraper
My calves are DYING from these hills send help immediately
Wanna take the trolley thing? I'll try not 2 fall off
just saw a sea lion at the pier and it burped at me I'm deceased
Pahk the cah and let's get some chowdah? (am I doing this right lol)
Everyone here went to an Ivy League and I'm intimidated
Do u wanna throw tea in the harbor for historical accuracy?
Do u wanna see where laws get made? Sounds boring but it's kinda cool
I'm eating lunch next to a monument and feeling patriotic af
just walked past 1600 Pennsylvania Ave and there's so much security omg
Beach day tmrw? The water is so turquoise I can't even
omg the Cuban sandwich I just ate changed my life no exaggeration
Everyone here is so tan and beautiful I feel like a vampire
Wanna grab some chicken and waffles? I need this combo in my life
This peach cobbler is sweeter than my grandma's compliments
omg the traffic here makes other cities look like a joke
Everything really IS bigger here including my belt after this BBQ
Do u wanna go line dancing? I bought boots 4 this exact reason
just saw someone wearing a 10-gallon hat unironically and I respect it
Space Center tmrw? I wanna pretend I'm smart enough 2 b an astronaut
This humidity is attacking my hair personally
omg the Tex-Mex here is ruining all other Mexican food 4 me
Cheesesteak debate: wit or witout? This determines our friendship
just saw a cracked bell and ppl r taking pics like it's the Mona Lisa lol
Do u wanna run up some movie stairs and pretend we're boxing champs?
The Motown vibes here r making me wanna start a girl group
Do u wanna see where they make cars? It's actually pretty sick
omg this coney dog has chili AND onions I'm in love
These hills r no joke but at least there's a sandwich w fries in it waiting
Wanna cross one of these iconic bridges? There's literally hundreds
just saw black and gold EVERYWHERE do they have other colors here?
Going up that giant arch tmrw, pray 4 my fear of heights
This BBQ is making me question my vegetarian phase from 2019
omg there's a museum that's literally a jungle gym 4 adults I'm not leaving
Everyone here codes and I barely know how 2 use Excel
Do u wanna tour some tech campuses? Free food is involved
just saw a self-driving car and I waved at it like an idiot
This coffee is so artisanal they explained its life story b4 serving it
Wanna hit up the world's biggest bookstore? I could live there
omg someone just rode by on a penny-farthing bicycle like it's 1890
Going up that space needle thing tmrw if the clouds clear
It's been drizzling for 5 days straight but honestly it's kinda aesthetic?
omg they threw a fish AT ME at the market and I caught it I'm a hero
It's 118 degrees rn how is this a real place ppl choose 2 live
Wanna hike at dawn b4 the sun tries to end us?
just touched a cactus on accident and I have regrets
Lost $50 at slots but won a free buffet so basically a financial genius?
Do u wanna see a show with acrobats defying physics 2nite?
omg it's 3am and everything is still open this place is wild
just drove past a studio and saw fake NY streets it's so weird
The Valley heat is different idk how to explain it but I'm melting
Wanna grab In-N-Out? I need animal style fries in my life rn
These falls r SO LOUD I literally can't hear u talking
omg these wings r actually from here this is like a pilgrimage
Do u wanna get soaked on a boat ride? It's freezing but worth it
The blues music on this street is making me feel things
omg I'm at the King's house and his taste was BOLD
This BBQ is so good I might cry actual tears of joy
just tried surfing and wiped out 50 times but aloha spirit kept me going
Do u wanna watch the sunset? It's gonna b perfect w palm trees and stuff
omg I had raw fish for breakfast and I'm never eating cereal again
The mountains here r making me feel v small and philosophical
Wanna try a green chili smother on everything? It's a lifestyle here
omg the air is so thin I'm out of breath just walking 2 my car
Keep it weird they said so I'm wearing a costume on a Tuesday
Do u wanna catch some live music? There's like 50 venues on this street
just had brisket for breakfast tacos and I've never been happier
Wanna grab beignets? I'm already covered in powdered sugar but idc
This jazz music is SO GOOD I might spontaneously start dancing
omg Bourbon Street at night is chaos in the best way possible
Every bar here has live country music and I'm not mad about it
Do u wanna tour the honky-tonks? My boots r made for walking
just had hot chicken and my mouth is on fire but it's worth it
The weather here is perfect 365 days a year it's actually unfair
Wanna hit the beach and then get fish tacos? Classic move
omg I just saw a sea lion AND a dolphin in the same hour blessed
Everyone here is a model or an actor or both it's intimidating
Do u wanna bike the strand? The ocean views r insane
just paid $20 for parking but the sunset over the pier was worth it
Wanna go brewery hopping? This place has like 200 craft options
The Rockies r RIGHT THERE I can literally see them from downtown
omg I just got altitude sickness from walking up stairs this is embarrassing
Everyone here is obsessed w racing and I kinda get it now?
Do u wanna try some Carolina BBQ? The vinegar sauce is different but good
just went to a bank museum bc apparently this is the banking capital lol
Wanna go to a theme park? There's like 10 to choose from
omg I just saw someone in a costume and I think it's their actual job
This place is basically theme parks and alligators and I'm here 4 it
Lost $100 but saw 3 shows and ate at a buffet so honestly winning?
Do u wanna see the fountains dance? They're free and iconic
omg someone just got married by Elvis this city is unreal
Beale Street is LIVE rn and I'm here for all of it
Do u wanna visit the King's house? It's v sequined and extra
just had dry rub ribs and I understand life now
This chili has cinnamon in it and it's on spaghetti but trust me it works
Wanna cross the river to another state? It's literally right there
omg the flying pig marathon statue is so random but I love it
The Rock Hall is making me wanna start a band ngl
Do u wanna try pierogies from this Polish place? They're huge
omg we're on the lake but also not on the ocean it's confusing my brain
Everyone here golfs in the desert and I have so many questions
Wanna hike a red rock trail b4 it gets 2 hot 2 function?
just saw a roadrunner irl and it did NOT go beep beep
Wanna walk across that famous bridge? The views r iconic
omg the pizza here is better than the other borough don't @ me
just took the train and saw like 10 different languages being spoken
Wanna hit the Beltline and pretend we're getting our steps in?
This sweet tea is 90% sugar and I'm not complaining
omg the aquarium whale shark is bigger than my apartment
Do u wanna see where JFK stuff happened? It's heavy but important
Everything here is air conditioned thank goodness bc it's HOT
just ate BBQ the size of my head and I'm in a food coma
The food scene here is SO GOOD and less expensive than across the bay
Wanna check out a protest? There's always something happening here
omg I just had Ethiopian food that changed my entire perspective on life
